downloadTitle: How to configure the Microsoft Dynamics CRM on-premises and Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online E-mail Router in different deployment scenarios
downloadDescription: These documents lists steps to configure  Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 and Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 e-mail in different deployment scenarios.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM4 E-mail Router Configuration Scenarios.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/e/3/7/e37c4b4b-4839-4ea5-bb6b-b4575315e1f5/Microsoft Dynamics CRM4 E-mail Router Configuration Scenarios.docx

detailsSection:
These documents list steps to configure Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 or Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 e-mail in different deployment scenarios. The scenarios included in these documents focus on the following:
• The Microsoft Dynamics CRM E-mail Router

• The forward mailbox

• The Microsoft Dynamics CRM Outlook client.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM4 E-mail Router Configuration Scenarios.docx
installInstructionSection: Click the download that you want in the Download area, and then open or save the document.
